acidBlast.name: Acid Blast
acidBlast.rules: When this model is destroyed, models within 2" of it suffer a POW 12 corrosion damage roll and the {quality:continuousEffectCorrosion}.

acidicMist.name: Acidic Mist
acidicMist.rules: This model has concealment. Living enemy models without {advantage:resistanceCorrosion} suffer -2 to attack rolls while within 2" of this model.

annihilator.name: Annihilator
annihilator.rules: This model gains an additional die on melee attack and melee damage rolls against living models. When a living model is destroyed within 3" of this model, it never generates a soul token.

apparition.name: Apparition
apparition.rules: During your Control Phase, place this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

arcaneCalibration.name: Arcane Calibration
arcaneCalibration.rules: Reduce the COST of each spell this model casts this activation by 1 to a minimum of 1.

arcaneInterference.name: Arcane Interference
arcaneInterference.rules: Upkeep spells and animi on a model directly hit with this weapon expire. A warjack directly hit with this weapon suffers {disruption}.

arcaneMachinery.name: Arcane Machinery
arcaneMachinery.rules: Once per turn at any time during its activation, this model can use one of the following effects. Arcane Machinery effects last for one round.

arcanePrecision.name: Arcane Precision
arcanePrecision.rules: If this model uses its Normal Movement to aim, it ignores {rule:cloudEffect} when determining LOS and ignores {advantage:stealth} that activation.

attackType.name: Attack Type
attackType.rules: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

banish.name: Banish
banish.rules: When this weapon boxes an enemy non-Leader model, immediately after the attack is resolved you can place the enemy model anywhere completely within 1" of its current location.

battlePlan.name: Battle Plan
battlePlan.rules: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation:

beatBack.name: Beat Back
beatBack.rules: Immediatly after a basic attack with this weapon is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

birdsEye.name: Birds Eye
birdsEye.rules: While in this model's control range, models in its battlegroup can ignore {rule:cloudEffect}, forest terrain and intervening models when determining LOS.

blackMantle.name: Black Mantle
blackMantle.rules: While B2B with a model with Black Mantle, friendly Faction models gain {advantage:stealth}.

bloodBoon.name: Blood Boon
bloodBoon.rules: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed an enemy model with this weapon, this model can cast a spell without spending focus or fury points.

bloodQuenched.name: Blood-Quenched
bloodQuenched.rules: This model gains a cumulative +1 ARM and +1 to its melle damage rolls for each enemy model it destroys with a melee attack during its activation. This bonus lasts for one round.

bloodShadow.name: Blood Shadow
bloodShadow.rules: If this attack boxes a living or undead model, this model can gain Incorporeal for one round.

brutalCharge.name: Brutal Charge
brutalCharge.rules: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

brutalDamage.name: Brutal Damage
brutalDamage.rules: On a direct hit, gain an additional die on this weapon's damage rolls against the target directly hit.

chopShop.name: Chop Shop
chopShop.rules: When a model in this model's battlegroup destroyed an enemy construct model with a melee attack, remove d3 + 1 damage points from model in this model's battlegroup currently in its control range and remove the destroyed model from play.

crater.name: Crater
crater.rules: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round

criticalCortexDamage.name: Critical Cortex Damage
criticalCortexDamage.rules: On a critical hit on a warjack, the warjack suffers 1 damage to its first available Cortex system box.

criticalKnockdown.name: Critical Knockdown
criticalKnockdown.rules: On a critical hit, models hit become knocked down.

criticalThunderclap.name: Critical Thunderclap
criticalThunderclap.rules: On a critical hit, models hit without {advantage:resistanceElectricity} become knocked down.

darkDomination.name: Dark Domination
darkDomination.rules: When this model hits an enemy warjack that has a non-crippled cortex with a basic melee attack made with this weapon during this model's activation, you can take control of the warjack. Immediately after the attack has been resolved, you can make a full advance with the warjack and can then make one basic attack, then Dark Domination expires. A warjack can be affected by Dark Domination only once per turn.

deathToll.name: Death Toll [Mechanithrall]
deathToll.rules: When this weapon boxes a living enemy warrior model, remove that model from play and return one Grunt to a small-based Mechanithrall unit within 8" of this model. Place the Grunt with 2" of another model in that unit. The Grunt must forfeit its Normal Movement and Combat Action the turn it is put into play.

defenseFormation.name: Defense Formation
defenseFormation.rules: While in this model's control range and B2B with one or more models in its battlegroup, model's battlegroup with an extra-large base or smaller gain +2 ARM and cannot become knocked down.

digIn.name: Dig In
digIn.rules: A model with Dig In gains {rule:cover}, gains {advantage:resistanceBlast}, and does not block LOS. The model remains dug in until it moves, is placed, or is {rule:engaged}.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.rules: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved.

electroLeap.name: Electro Leap
electroLeap.rules: When a model is directly hit with a basic attack made with this weapon, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 3" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 electrical damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.

empoweredAttack.name: Empowered Attack
empoweredAttack.rules: This weapon gains +2 on its damage rolls.

entropicForce.name: Entropic Force
entropicForce.rules: While within 5" of this model, enemy models lose Tough and cannot have damage removed from them.

erosion.name: Erosion
erosion.rules: This model gains an additional die on this weapon's damage rolls against construct models.

evasive.name: Evasive
evasive.rules: When this model is hit by an enemy ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to 2".

feignDeath.name: Feign Death
feignDeath.rules: A model with Feign Death cannot be targeted by ranged or arcane attacks while knocked down.

fieldMarshal.name: Field Marshal [$1]
fieldMarshal.rules: {rule:cohort} models in this model's battlegroup gain $1.

gang.name: Gang
gang.rules: When making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another model in this unit, this model gains +2 to melee attack and damage rolls.

gatesOfHell.name: Gates of Hell
gatesOfHell.rules: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed a living or undead enemy model with this weapon, this model can spend one soul token to be placed anywhere completely within 4" of its current location, then its activation ends.

ghostShield.name: Ghost Shield
ghostShield.rules: This model gains +1 ARM for each soul token currently on it.

grapplingHook.name: Grappling Hook
grapplingHook.rules: At the end of this models activation, this model can spend 1 focus point to be placed completely within 5" of its current location.

grievousWounds.name: Grievous Wounds
grievousWounds.rules: A model hit by this weapon loses {tough} and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

headShot.name: Head Shot
headShot.rules: Models disabled by a ranged attack made by this model cannot make a Tough roll. Models destroyed by a ranged attack made by this model are removed from play.

heartSeeker.name: Heart Seeker
heartSeeker.rules: Gain an additional die on damage rolls resulting from this atack. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

hexBlast.name: Hex Blast
hexBlast.rules: Hex Blast is a RNG 10, AOE2, POW 13/8 arcane attack. Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

invocationOfBitterestNight.name: Invocation of Bitterest Night
invocationOfBitterestNight.rules: This model gains {advantage:stealth} and {ability:blackMantle} for one round.

ionizationCtrl.name: Ionization [CTRL]
ionizationCtrl.rules: When a model without {advantage:resistanceElectricity} suffers an electrical damage roll while within this model's control range of this model, add +2 to the roll.

ionizationRng.name: Ionization [$1]
ionizationRng.rules: When a model without {advantage:resistanceElectricity} suffers an electrical damage roll while within $1" of this model, add +2 to the roll.

ironHorse.name: Iron Horse
ironHorse.rules: Light and heavy warjacks in this model'S battlegroup gain {pathfinder} and {ability:reposition-5}. Additionally, light and heavy warjack in this model's battlegroup gain +2 SPD when resolving charges.

killingSpree.name: Killing Spree
killingSpree.rules: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during its Combat Action, after that attack is resolved this model can advance up to 1" and make one additional melee attack.

kineticGrip.name: Kinetic Grip
kineticGrip.rules: When a model is directly hit by this attack, it suffers -2 SPD for one round.

knowledgeOfTheDamned.name: Knowledge of the Damned
knowledgeOfTheDamned.rules: When a model in this model's control range makes an attack or damage roll, this model can spend a soul token to cause that model to re-roll the roll. Each roll can be re-rolled only once due to Knowledge of the Damned.

leadership.name: Leadership-[$1]
leadership.rules: While within 10" of this model, friendly $1 models gain {ability:headShot}.

lifeDrinker.name: Life Drinker
lifeDrinker.rules: When this model boxes a living enemy model with this weapon, this model can remove d3 damage points.

lightningGenerator.name: Lightning Generator
lightningGenerator.rules: When a model is directly hit with a basic attack made with this weapon, lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 3" of the last model it arced to, ignoring this model. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers a POW 10 electrical damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage from the attack that caused the leap.

magicAbility.name: Magic Ability
magicAbility.rules: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

necrosurgery.name: Necrosurgery [d3+1]
necrosurgery.rules: RNG 1. Target friendly undead Faction model. If the model is in range, remove d3+1 damage points from it.

oathOfVengeance.name: Oath of Vengeance [$1]
oathOfVengeance.rules: This model gains +2 to its attack and damage rolls against $1 models.

polarityField.name: Polarity Field
polarityField.rules: This model cannot be targeted by a charge or slam power attack made by a construct model.

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
poltergeist.rules: When an enemy model misses this model with an attack, immediately after the attack is resolved you can choose to push the enemy d3" directly away from this model.

precisionStrike.name: Precision Strike
precisionStrike.rules: While within 10" of this model, friendly models ignore other friendly models when determining LOS. Friendly models can advance through other friendly models within 10" of this model if they have enough movement to move completely past them. Precision Strike lasts for one turn.

prowl.name: Prowl
prowl.rules: While this model has {concealment}, it gains {advantage:stealth}.

relentlessCharge.name: Relentless Charge
relentlessCharge.rules: While advancing as part of a charge, a model with Relentless Charge gains {pathfinder}.

reload.name: Reload [$1"]
reload.rules: This model can spend [$1] focus or fury point to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action

repair.name: Repair
repair.rules: Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove d3 + 1 damage points from it.

repairable.name: Repairable
repairable.rules: This model can be targeted with {ability:repair} special actions as if it were a construct model.

reposition.name: Reposition [$1"]
reposition.rules: At the end of a model/unit's activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to $1", then its activation ends.

retaliatoryStrike.name: Retaliatory Strike
retaliatoryStrike.rules: If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by an enemy melee attack during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved the model with Retaliatory Strike can immediately make one basic melee attack against the attacking model. A model can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.rules: When a model with Riposte is missed by an enemy melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved the model with Riposte can make one basic melee attack against the attacking model.

runAndGun.name: Run & Gun
runAndGun.rules: At the end of its activation, if this model destroyed one or more enemy models with ranged attacks that activation, it can make a full advance.

sideStep.name: Side Step
sideStep.rules: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved

soulTakerCullSoul.name: Soul Taker: Cull Soul
soulTakerCullSoul.rules: This model can gain soul tokens. When a living enemy model is destroyed within 2" of this model, this m odel gains the destroyed model's soul token. After this model replenishes its focus during your next Control Phase, replace each soul token with 1 focus point.

soulTakerSpectralScavenger.name: Soul Taker: Spectral Scavenger
soulTakerSpectralScavenger.rules: This model can gain soul tokens. When a living model is destroyed in this model's control range, this model gains the destroyed model's soul token. This model can have up to three soul tokens at any time. This model can spend soul tokens for the following:.

specialOrders.name: Special Orders
specialOrders.rules: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains {ability:reposition-3} for one turn.

steady.name: Steady
steady.rules: This model cannot become knocked down.

stormcall.name: Stormcall
stormcall.rules: Attacks made with this weapon ignore {rule:concealement}, {rule:cover}, {rule:elevationBonus} and {advantage:stealth}

strengthOfDeath.name: Strength of Death
strengthOfDeath.rules: During its Combat Action, this model can spend soul tokens to boost one attack or damage roll for each token spent.

sustainedAttack.name: Sustained Attack
sustainedAttack.rules: During this model's activation, when it makes an attack with this weapon against the last model hit by the weapon this activation, the attack automatically hits.

swiftHunter.name: Swift Hunter
swiftHunter.rules: When a model with Swift Hunter destroys one or more enemy models with a basic ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can advance up to 2".

tenacity.name: Tenacity
tenacity.rules: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains {ability:feignDeath} for one round.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.rules: Enemy models hit are pushed d3" directly away from the attacking model. On a critical hit, the enemy model becomes knocked down after being pushed.

vengeance.name: Vengeance
vengeance.rules: During your Maintenance Phase, if one or more models in this unit were damaged by enemy attacks during the last round, each model in the unit can advance 3" and make one basic melee attack.

vexingAlignement.name: Vexing Alignement
vexingAlignement.rules: Increase this model's control range by 4".

vitalMagic.name: Vital Magic
vitalMagic.rules: When a spell or special rule would cause one or more of this model's upkeep spells to expire, this model can keep one or more of its upkeep spells in play by suffering d3 damage points for each spell kept in play.

volumeFire.name: Volume Fire
volumeFire.rules: Gain +1 to attack and damage rolls with this weapon against medium-based models and +2 to attack and damage rolls against larger-based models.

witchMark.name: Witch Mark
witchMark.rules: If this atack hits an enemy model during this model's activation, until the end of that activation this model can target and automatically hit that enemy model with spells, ignoring RNG and LOS.

wraithbinder.name: Wraithbinder
wraithbinder.rules: While within 10" of this model, friendly incorporeal models gain +3 ARM.
